content: lion brand pattern # 40424 *cbs-pompomblanket pdf* skill level easy level 2 babysoft® article #920 4 colors 2 balls each 8 balls total *spring green bluebell lavender white* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm pom pom maker special stitch single_crochet in single_crochet 4 row below vertical feature in main color work blanket in alternating color bands with two strands held together throughout crochet edging to finish optional make small pompoms with leftover a b and c and sew them at regular intervals all around the edging
